Class CapturingRoute

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.Restlet
      org.restlet.routing.Filter

              org.restlet.routing.Route
                  com.threecrickets.prudence.util.CapturingRoute
All Implemented Interfaces:
Uniform
public class CapturingRoute
extends Route

A Route that always scores 0.0 for captured requests. Useful for making sure that captured requests are captured again.

Author:
Tal Liron
See Also:
CapturingRouter
